reviewText: Best bio of Poe I've seen.  The dramatization of "The Cask of Amontillado" is excellent and chilling.  Wish this was available in DVD format--great for the classroom.

This is one of the best documentaries on Poe I have seen.  I especially like the dramatic scenes from "The Cask of Amontillado" and "The Tell-Tale Heart."  It is difficult to find decent Poe dramatizations that can be shown in the classroom.  I do wish this was available on DVD and that the director of the dramatic scenes, Joyce Chopra, had gone on to film all the Poe stories in full.
